info.title: Gym Multi-Tenant API
info.description: API documentation for the Laravel Gym Management system

post.description: Updates gym details via POST method spoofing. Send `multipart/form-data` including a `_method` field with the exact value `PUT`.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Gym to update

requestBody.description: Gym data including the _method field for PUT spoofing.

_method.description: Must be set to PUT to update the resource.

delete.summary: Delete a gym and all related records

is_enabled.description: Indicates if this feature is enabled
Indicates if this feature is enabled

is_primary.description: Indicates if this is the primary domain

is_active.description: Indicates if the subscription plan is active

description_ar.example: الوصول إلى جميع مرافق الصالة الرياضية

UpdateGymRequest.description: Schema for updating gym data. Note: The _method field is added separately in the operation definition for spoofing.

features.description: JSON string or object for features

is_enabled.description: Indicates if this feature is enabled

actions.description: JSON string or object for actions

is_enabled.description: Indicates if this feature is enabled

is_primary.description: Indicates if this is the primary domain

privacy_file.description: Upload a privacy policy file (file upload)

side_effects_file.description: Upload a side effects file (file upload)

description_en.example: Updated access to all gym facilities

description_ar.example: تحديث الوصول إلى جميع مرافق الصالة الرياضية

tags.name: Actions
tags.description: API Endpoints for managing system actions

tags.name: Subscription Plans
